# Group - 组织

# 获取某个用户的加入的组织列表

GET /users/:login/groups
# 或
GET /users/:id/groups

# Response

Array<UserSerializer>

Example:

{
 "data": [
   {
     "id": 3,
     "login": "skylark",
     "name": "云雀",
     "avatar_url": "https:///...jpg",
     "description": "",
     "created_at": "2016-09-06T23:44:00.000Z",
     "updated_at": "2016-09-06T23:44:00.000Z"
   },
   {
     "id": 2,
     "login": "foo",
     "name": "Foo",
     "avatar_url": "https://....jpg",
     "description": "",
     "created_at": "2016-09-06T23:44:00.000Z",
     "updated_at": "2016-09-06T23:44:00.000Z"
   }
 ]
}

# 获取公开组织列表

GET /groups

# Response

Array<UserSerializer>

Example:

{
 "data": [
   {
     "id": 3,
     "login": "skylark",
     "name": "云雀",
     "avatar_url": "https:///...jpg",
     "description": "",
     "created_at": "2016-09-06T23:44:00.000Z",
     "updated_at": "2016-09-06T23:44:00.000Z"
   },
   {
     "id": 2,
     "login": "foo",
     "name": "Foo",
     "avatar_url": "https://....jpg",
     "description": "",
     "created_at": "2016-09-06T23:44:00.000Z",
     "updated_at": "2016-09-06T23:44:00.000Z"
   }
 ]
}

# 创建 Group

POST /groups

# Parameters

Name

Type

Description

name

string

组织名称

login

string

login

description

string

介绍

# Response

UserSerializer

# 获取单个组织的详细信息

GET /groups/:login
# 或
GET /groups/:id

# Response

UserSerializer

Example:

{
   "abilities": {
   	"read": false,
   	"update": false,
   	"destroy": false,
   	"group_user": {
   		"create": false,
   		"update": false,
   		"destroy": false
   	},
   	"repo": {
   		"create": false,
   		"update": false,
   		"destroy": false
   	}
   },
   "data": {
   	"id": 37,
   	"type": "Group",
   	"login": "tech",
   	"name": "技术讨论",
   	"description": "This is a test Group",
   "avatar_url": "https://...jpg",
   	"owner_id": 6,
   	"created_at": "2016-08-21T18:08:48.000Z",
   	"updated_at": "2016-12-15T04:35:46.000Z"
   }
}

# 更新单个组织的详细信息

PUT /groups/:login
# 或
PUT /groups/:id

需要 Group 的 abilities.update 权限。

# Parameters

Name

Type

Description

name

string

组织名称

login

string

login

description

string

介绍

# Response

UserSerializer

# 删除组织

DELETE /groups/:login
# 或
DELETE /groups/:id

需要 Group 的 abilities.destroy 权限。

此接口仅会删除 Group 基本信息，其他有关的仓库、文档、画板均保持不动，以避免误删除以后需要恢复。

# 获取组织成员信息

GET /groups/:login/users
# 或
GET /groups/:id/users

需要 abilities.group.read 权限

# Response

Array<GroupUserSerializer>

{
 "data": [
   {
     "id": 20,
     "group_id": 5,
     "user_id": 1,
     "role": 0,
     "created_at": "2016-08-16T22:34:20.000Z",
     "updated_at": "2016-08-16T22:34:20.000Z",
     "user": {
       "id": 1,
       "login": "someone1",
       "name": "某某1",
       "avatar_url": "https://...jpg",
       "created_at": "2016-08-16T07:20:49.000Z",
       "updated_at": "2016-08-16T07:20:49.000Z"
     }
   },
   {
     "id": 161,
     "group_id": 5,
     "user_id": 3,
     "role": 1,
     "created_at": "2017-02-28T08:19:30.000Z",
     "updated_at": "2017-02-28T08:19:30.000Z",
     "user": {
       "id": 3,
       "login": "someone2",
       "name": "某某2",
       "avatar_url": "https://...jpg",
       "created_at": "2016-09-06T23:44:00.000Z",
       "updated_at": "2016-09-06T23:44:00.000Z"
     }
   }
 ]
}

# 增加或更新组织成员

PUT /groups/:group_login/users/:login
# 或
PUT /groups/:group_id/users/:login

需要 abilities.group_user.read 权限

# Parameters

Name

Type

Description

role

Integer

0 - 管理员, 1 - 普通成员

  • 需要有 abilities.group_user.create 权限

  • role 为 0 的时候，需要 abilities.group_user.update 权限

# Response

GroupUserSerializer

# 删除组织成员

DELETE /groups/:group_login/users/:login
# 或
DELETE /groups/:group_id/users/:login

需要有 abilities.group_user.destroy 权限

此外，不可以自己删除自己。
